snippet.title: Tempest - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/418180/
AppStore: https://itunes.apple.com/app/id1127729015 
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.herocraft.game.tempest

About Tempest:
When we created Tempest, we focused on the most thrilling part of pirate life – sea battles. 
As you navigate the dangerous waters of the game you won’t just catch up with merchants, but you will encounter fellow pirates, creepy followers of a mysterious cult and terrible mythical monsters: Kraken, Leviathan and other infamous creatures.

Follow us:
Facebook http://www.facebook.com/herocraft.games
Twitter https://twitter.com/herocraft
VK https://vk.com/herocraft
